P

pause() - Method in class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.BasicPlayer
Stops the data but retains the place reached in the playback of the loaded data
pause() - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.Player
Pauses the player
PhantomDevice - Class in com.uce.userlab.haptics
This Class encapsulates the functionality of a Phantom device, it builds on top of the HDAPI to give a more object based approach to managing a haptic device.
PhantomDevice(String) - Constructor for class com.uce.userlab.haptics.PhantomDevice
The constructor, creates a new instance of the Phantom device for the device specified
Player - Interface in com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces
This Interface layout the default set of players methods and behavours that all complete implementations of a good Player should have.
PlayerEventSupport - Class in com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.event
This supports the Player implementations with manageing PlayerListeners and event calls to those PlayerListeners.
PlayerEventSupport(Object) - Constructor for class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.event.PlayerEventSupport
Creates a new PlayerEventSupport object
PlayerListener - Interface in com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces
This interface layout the method that must be provided to be a Player Listener, this interface must be implemented by all objects that wish to listener to player events.
playerReset(MotionEvent) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.PlayerListener
This event is fired if the player is reset
playerUpdate(MotionEvent) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.PlayerListener
This event is fired if the player is updated at any point in its life
playingStarted(MotionEvent) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.PlayerListener
This event is fired if the player starts playing a motion recording
playingStoped(MotionEvent) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.PlayerListener
This event is fired if the player stops playing a motion recording
playSkipBackward(MotionEvent) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.PlayerListener
This event is fired if the player is skiped backwards in the motion playing
playSkipForward(MotionEvent) - Method in interface com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.interfaces.PlayerListener
This event is fired if the player is skiped forwards in the motion playing
PointerLocation - Class in com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion
This represents a location in a 3D space, it provides access to x,y,z coOrdinates and comparison and basic function support.
PointerLocation(double, double, double) - Constructor for class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.PointerLocation
Creates a new PointerLocation with coOrdinates x,y,z
PointerRelocator - Class in com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion
This Object represents a Pointer relocator, it allows a point to be give that you wish the haptic device to travel to and stay until another location is specified.
PointerRelocator(Device) - Constructor for class com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.PointerRelocator
Creates a new PointerRelocator for a given device
